mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ctg_user (user_id, naver_id, user_name, user_nickname, user_email, user_birthyear, user_admin, user_photo, user_introduce, user_signdate) VALUES (ctg_user_seq.nextval, #{naverId}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userEmail}, #{userBirthYear}, #{userAdmin}, #{userPhoto}, #{userIntroduce}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, naver_id AS naverId, user_name AS userName, user_nickname AS userNickname, user_email AS userEmail, user_birthyear AS userBirthYear, user_admin AS userAdmin, user_photo AS userPhoto, user_introduce AS userIntroduce FROM ctg_user WHERE SUBSTR(naver_id, 1, 10) = #{naverIdFront} AND SUBSTR(naver_id, -10) = #{naverIdRear}

SELECT user_id AS userId, naver_id AS naverId, user_name AS userName, user_nickname AS userNickname, user_email AS userEmail, user_birthyear AS userBirthYear, user_admin AS userAdmin, user_photo AS userPhoto, user_introduce AS userIntroduce FROM ctg_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
